item.title: STERIS plc 10-K
item.description: STERIS plc, which is in the Orthopedic, Prosthetic & Surgical Appliances & Supplies [3842] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 31, 2022 had 40180 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 372 instances march - 338 instances 31 - 324 instances financial - 315 instances 2021 - 308 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
